item.title: I Can Have Peanuts
item.description: I am so grateful that I can have peanuts. I love peanuts. Lightly salted. Lightly roasted without salt. Cooked (with a little salt) Or just raw. Or in Chiwada, or Khichadi It occurred to me that although it might seem trivial, it is a previledge to be able to eat peanuts. I know few people - who can not. Because they are old and have “teeth problems” Or (as seen on American TV shows) - have peanut allergies.
